channel.title: Runserver.bat Problem! HELP!
channel.description:
[code]javac: invalid flag: -Xmx512m Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
This is displayed everytime i try to run my server.
This is what is in the runserver.bat
[code]@echo off color 0a title Server "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server pause[/code]
Please help!!!!!

item.title: Runserver.bat Problem! HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Pblord7 Pblord7
item.description:
@Pblord7 wrote:

Here’s mine.

@echo off
title Pbscape is :
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.11-ga-bin.jar server

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver.bat Problem! HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

[quote=“getting icy, post:3, topic:397459”]I changed javac to javaw and when i run the command the “_” just sits there blinking and doesn’t pop up any thing like “server online”
revision and base?[/quote]

Revision is for example, a 317. The base for example would be Project Insanity. And as I said, try downloading a server with the same revision/base as you and take that run code and paste it into yours.

Read full topic
